mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Ensley, Peter
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Buck Hill, Bedford Co., PA [Buck Hill, Bedford County, Pennsylvania]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Ensley, Peter Patient Age: 38. Marital Status: Married. Diagnosis: Gun shot flesh wound right thigh middle third. Ball entered posterior aspect passing upward and inward to about middle of thigh. Bullet cut out at Winchester Hospital on same day. Received wound while driving train.. Location Wounded: Cedar Creek, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/10/19. Nature of Wound: Buckshot. Result: Returned to duty.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Ensley, Peter

Gun shot flesh wound right thigh middle third. Ball entered posterior aspect passing upward and inward to about middle of thigh. Bullet cut out at Winchester Hospital on same day. Received wound while driving train.
Private
L
22nd PA Cav [22nd Pennsylvania Cavalry]

Hospital Number 4839
